participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: reflective and somewhat cynical, with a hint of ambition.
participant_1.background: i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i fantasize about taking over the world. i've two grown children who never visit. i am a 56 year old woman.

participant_2.name: Dexter
participant_2.personality: quirky and inventive, with a touch of misanthropy.
participant_2.background: i've an allergy to water. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i am a recluse. i helped design the game starcraft.

content.text: wow , interesting are you any good ?
